metadata.title: USN-6374-1 -- Mutt vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Mutt incorrectly handled certain email header contents. If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted message, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2023-4874, CVE-2023-4875)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6374-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  mutt - 2.1.4-1ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
